sense.def: Alternative Names zhang jian 脹堅 , distension with hardness. Illness Sign of an uncomfortable feeling of distension associated with an abdomen that appears hard when pressed. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 12: 筋極則拘攣，小腹堅脹，心痛，膝寒 冷，四肢骨節皆疼痛 , “If the sinews are affected to an extreme, they will cramp and contract. The lower abdomen feels hard and distended . The heart aches, the knees are cold. The bones and joints of the four limbs are all in pain”.
